de.uni_koeln.spinfo.strings.algo.suffixtrees.naive
Class CompactSuffixTree

java.lang.Object
  de.uni_koeln.spinfo.strings.algo.suffixtrees.naive.AbstractSuffixTree
      de.uni_koeln.spinfo.strings.algo.suffixtrees.naive.CompactSuffixTree

public class CompactSuffixTree
extends AbstractSuffixTree

A compact suffix tree, constructed from a simple suffix tree (a suffix trie), with a runtime complexity of O(n^2). (Algorithmus 4.8, Seite 62 in Boeckenhauer & Bongartz)

Author:
Fabian Steeg

exportAsDot

public void exportAsDot(java.lang.String location)
Exports the tree as dot to the given location

Parameters:
location - The location to export to

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Constructs a compact suffix tree for a given text by first constructing a simple suffix tree and then making it compact. Prints some information about the constructed tree to the console.

Parameters:
args - A String[] with one or two elements, the text to be represented by this tree, with an optional argument for verbose output (alone of before the text), or an empty String[] for execution without arguments (see inline comment).
